page.title: 18HOUSING Village housing
page.content: In{Blackboys}there are many very old houses and cottages,these are mostly 400 years old and have old tiled roofs and interesting chimneys.They are often built of sandstone as it was found in the area.They were built with huge oak beams as supports,many of which were obtained from very old ships.Then there are several cottages, usually in pairs that were built at the end of the 19th century.Several say they were built to commemorate the Golden Jubilee of Queen Victoria,as was the school house. There are three new estates of houses.One is called "Mount Pleasant", one "The Green" and the other one "Star Lane".These are not unattractive houses and though they have increased the villages population,they have not spoilt the look of the village. (Jason Denby, Lee Nicholson.)
